org.simulationsystems.csf.distsys.adapters.jade.api

Class JADE_MAS_RunContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simulationsystems.csf.distsys.adapters.jade.api.JADE_MAS_RunContext

  • public class JADE_MAS_RunContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The simulation run context for the JADE MAS. Provides the mechanism for the JADE MAS to communicate with with ABMS systems (like RepastS) for a simulation run.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jorge Calderon
